content.text: Doing good! I went for a walk today after work even though I was tired
I feel you. I have a hard time getting out of bed some mornings.
My cat Sherlock and I love to watch mystery movies together
I love a good mystery. What's your favorite mystery movie?
The Usual Suspects is my favorite
That's a good one! I also like The Silence of the Lambs
I love the psychological aspect of that movie
That's one of the things I like about it too.
I also love movies where the twist is unexpected
That's always fun! I love being surprised
Me too! It's like a little gift
I agree! Mystery movies are the best
